subject: Sporting Goods and Equipment
Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Helmets
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Virginia Tech scientists and engineers will test popular brands and establish a ratings system similar to that of football helmets in an effort to reduce the number of concussions.
snippet: Virginia Tech scientists and engineers will test popular brands and establish a ratings system similar to that of football helmets in an effort to reduce the number of concussions.
